product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner features a soft and elegant design themed around luxury jewelry. It is visually divided diagonally, with a light pastel pink background complemented by a slightly darker blush pink gradient in the bottom-right triangle. The central focus is the “product_image” which showcases a pair of intricately designed rose gold and diamond-studded earrings. The "heading" text introduces the product name in a bold, uppercase sans-serif font, capturing attention with its deep rose color. Below, the "tagline" uses a decorative typeface hinting at vintage elegance. The "description" text, positioned underneath, lists key product features in a clean bullet-point layout. The "price" text stands out boldly, matched in color and tone with the call-to-action rectangle "cta_button", which houses the white "cta_text" encouraging users to take action. Subtle decorative SVG elements, including tiny circles and abstract sparkle shapes, enrich the backdrop without overpowering the main content.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink: `#f8d7d7`
- Blush Pink: `#f7bec0`
- Deep Rose (Text/Buttons): `#9d3c3c`
- Pale Rose Accent: `#cb6d6d`
- Brownish Text: `#633030`
- White: `#ffffff`
product_color: The product image showcases elegant earrings that predominantly feature a delicate **rose gold** base (#F7B2B7), which adds warmth and luxury. This soft pinkish-metallic tone harmoniously blends with the **clear white of the gemstones** (#FFFFFF) that add brilliance and sparkle. The pear-shaped blush stone introduces a subtle **peach-pink** hue (#FAD4D5), enhancing the romantic appeal. The crystals have light **silver reflections** (#DCE1E3), providing contrast without overpowering the femininity of the overall design. These colors are well-blended, with the rose gold encasing each gem gently, highlighting their clarity and brilliance—ideal for a soft, luxurious, and refined advertisement banner.
